title: 求助 ! MC服务器不能开启!!!!!
author: Mikude39
txt_content:
服务器核心1.7.10
日志如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Who set us up the TNT?

Time: 5/16/17 1:52 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.net.UnknownHostException: #?????????§
        at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
        at java.net.InetAddress$2.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:136)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:494)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:628)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.10
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        Java Version: 1.8.0_131, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 112247120 bytes (107 MB) / 128974848 bytes (123 MB) up to 1890582528 bytes (1803 MB)
        JVM Flags: 0 total; 
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        CraftBukkit Information: 
   Running: 
   Failed to handle CraftCrashReport:
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.bukkit.Bukkit.getName(Bukkit.java:76)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftCrashReport.call(CraftCrashReport.java:20)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.CrashReportSystemDetails.a(SourceFile:74)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.CrashReport.h(CrashReport.java:45)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.CrashReport.<init>(CrashReport.java:33)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:569)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:628)

        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Is Modded: Definitely; Server brand changed to 'PaperSpigot'
        Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)




已安装forge，请问这是什么情况呢？
mod:


插件:

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
服务器根目录下打开server.properties
搜索server-ip，删掉等号后面的参数，设置后是这样：
server-ip=复制代码

replies.author: a碧海蓝天
replies.txt_content:
图片都提示图片来自QQ空间 未经允许不可引用
在服务器根目录下有个server.properties
里面有项server-ip
不要填什么自家IP地址,填0.0.0.0或留空就好
